Topic: Draw a fish in their habitat with labels.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a fish in their habitat.
The student can label the water as the fish's home.
The student can show what the fish needs in its environment (e.g., water, plants, or other animals it might interact with).
The student can label different parts of the drawing, like water, plants, and other animals.
The student can represent how the fish and its environment form a system where each part helps the fish survive.
